links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (Haskell)a053092 n = f 1 where   f x = case x `kara` n of              Nothing -> f $ 2 * x              Just y  -> y   kara a b = if null ks then Nothing else Just $ head ks              where ks = [c | c <- [1..a], a <= c * b, a > c * (b - 1)]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 30 2013
author: Robert Lozyniak (11(AT)onna.com), Feb 27 2000
